title: Seedhe Maut - Lunch Break India Tour 2024
subtitle: Still On A Lunch Break!
location: Bengaluru
description:
Catch the 'best in the business' in a city near you! Seedhe Maut are taking their hit mixtape on a massive 12-city pan-India tour. The dynamic duo, known for their explosive live performances, will be playing an extended set and will feature several special guests as well as a few surprises! Get your tickets now! 

Having mastered the art of delivering razor-sharp rhymes - this Delhi-based duo comprising Encore ABJ and Calm has used their lyrical dexterity to push forward the boundaries of Hip-Hop in India. Presenting Hindi Rap in a revolutionary new format, Seedhe Maut is taking the industry by storm and is unanimously regarded as the next big thing to break in the rapidly growing subculture landscape.

Age Restriction: 16+

title: Shreya Ghoshal “All Hearts Tour" - Bengaluru
subtitle: By Superhits 93.5 RED FM
location: Bengaluru
description:
Superhits 93.5 RED FM brings Shreya Ghoshal, All hearts tour Bengaluru RED LIVE
in Concert Co-presented by Kalaluha.
Let's experience the magic of Shreya Ghoshal's All Hearts Tour in Namma
Bengaluru. Prepare to be captivated by the mesmerizing blend of Shreya Ghoshal's
soulful voice and magnetic stage presence, accompanied by a talented band that
infuses energy and finesse into every performance.

title: Mid Wicket Stories
venue: ITC Gardenia, a Luxury Collection Hotel
location: 1, Residency Rd, Ashok Nagar
description: Stumps Up for Stories: An Evening with Cricket's Icons Sir Geoffrey Boycott and Sunil Gavaskar. Calling all cricket fans for timeless conversation. Join us for an unforgettable evening as we discuss the legends who shaped the game we love. Don't miss this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to hear the inside stories from the heroes of cricket. They are going to discuss cricket stories from the time when the internet was not there. Get ready for a journey back in time as we bring together legendary cricketers for a timeless conversation that transcends eras! From Yesterday's Glory to Today's Inspiration: Join us for an unforgettable evening of cricket stories and timeless wisdom from the cricketing legends who've shaped the game we adore. It's not just an event; it's a pilgrimage for every cricket fan seeking to relive the magic of yesteryears.

title: Married Men These Days
location: Building No.480, KHB Colony, 5th Block, Koramangala
description: Welcome to the most hilarious celebration of love – it`s the "Married Men These Day" Standup Line Up! Grab your sweetheart, leave the kids with the babysitter, and get ready for a night of gut-busting laughter as our seasoned comics navigate the ups and downs of married life. Picture this: a lineup of witty husbands who`ve mastered the art of surviving "These Days". From the quest for the perfect gift to the delicate dance of planning the ideal date night, our comedians will take you on a rollercoaster of relatable anecdotes and side-splitting observations about the challenges and triumphs of being married on the most love-filled day of the year. Expect uproarious tales of last-minute flower shopping, attempts at romantic gestures gone wrong, and the eternal struggle to decode the mysteries of the perfect Love Greeting card.

title: Ridiculous - Stand Up Comedy Show
location: 178, 5th Main Rd, Binnamangala, Hoysala Nagar, Indiranagar
description: About the show: Prepare yourself for an unforgettable evening of laughter as "Ridiculous" takes center stage with four of the wittiest stand-up comedians hailing from the vibrant city of Bangalore. Join us for a comedy extravaganza that blends the city`s tech-savvy charm, cultural quirks, and the unique flavor of everyday life. Ridiculous promises an evening filled with relatable humor delivered with the unique comedic flair that sets Bangalore`s stand-up comedy scene apart.

title: CrossOver Music Festival
subtitle: Unwind. Experience. Relive.
location: 26/1, Rooftop, World Trade Center, Dr Rajkumar Rd, Malleshwara
description:
Bangalore’s very own music festival - CrossOver Music Festival is back in your city with a massive Artist Line up & Production like never seen before this April. Brace yourselves, techno lovers. 

#CentiGradeTurns11Edition

6th April: Hunter/Game (Afterlife) + Ranjana & many more

7th April: Almost Human B2B Mafaiza + Sidbit & many more

title: SCC SkyCinema - Jab We Met
subtitle: When the sun goes down the show comes on
location: Konanakunte Cross Metro Station, Anjanadri Layout, Konanakunte
description:
"Mein Apni Favourite Hoon” - Jab We Met 

All aboard for a night of love, laughter, and unforgettable moments as we bring you the iconic Bollywood masterpiece. Sunset Cinema Club invites you to join us for a cinematic experience that will touch your heart and leave you with a smile at Forum South Bangalore Mall. 

Enjoy your favorite movie on a breezy terrace, perched on the rooftop of Forum South Bangalore Mall. Here you'll have an unobstructed view of the night sky, creating a unique and immersive cinema experience as you sink into comfy bean bags or mattresses and watch the movie on a large screen with the skyline of the city as your backdrop.

title: SCC Picnic Cinema - Scent Of A Woman
subtitle: When the sun goes down the show comes on
location: 82/2, Gantiganahalli
description:
"The day we stop looking, Charlie, is the day we die." - Scent Of A Woman

Sunset Cinema Club invites you to embark on an unforgettable cinematic experience with a screening of this timeless classic at Garden City Beer Collective (GCBC). This gripping drama explores themes of friendship, honor, and the beauty of life's simple pleasures.

Come for an evening of cinematic delight, as the sun goes down, and the show comes on! Enjoy a picnic-y ambiance, where you can sit or even lie down on comfy bean bags, surrounded by lush green grass! String lights illuminate the area, casting a warm glow that sets the perfect mood for the evening, while you enjoy your favorite film on a large screen with surround sound accompanied with delicious munchies and drinks!

title: Church Street Gaming by The Boardgame Den
location: Pavilion Mall, 62/63, Church St, Haridevpur, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description: Detox from technology, interact with people, and have a blast! We have games from around the world that will get you hooked. Chill out with a light fun game or indulge in a rapt Euro one. Boardgames are for everyone! We have been collecting international board games for the last 15 years. We gather every weekend to play these games. Anyone over the age of 14 is welcome! You can come by yourself or in a group and don't worry about not knowing how to play them. We will help you find a suitable game, gather players, and teach you the rules. The events are conducted inside the WeWork Pavillion, which is on Church Street, in between the Metro Station and Starbucks. It is the Purva building right opposite Matteo Coffee. PS: We charge a flat entry fee for the entire event and don't charge additionally per game or by the hour. Once you are in, feel free to play as many games as you like until close.

title: Motta Maadi Music - Unplugged!
location: WJM8+FFW, Hosur Rd, KHB Colony, 5th Block, Koramangala
description:
Vanakkam Bangalore Makkaley!

As promised, we are bringing the ‘Unplugged’ show to Bengaluru! This dream show of ours was launched in Chennai last November and finally, we are bringing it to other cities :) Bringing in raw and exhilarating music, celebrating the most beautiful thamizh melodies, and more importantly the beautiful The Sunshine Orchestra. Our ‘Unplugged’ show was one of our favorite shows ever. When we did it in Chennai, it was emotional and magical! Please come along with your friends and family to sing along in this format :)  We are performing in ‘Jyoti Nivas Auditorium- Koramangala’ on April 7th - Sunday Come off. It will be magical ♥️

title: Kids Art Summer Camp
location: 16, 4th floor, SV Atrium, Tree Park Metro Station, ECC Rd, behind Bhagini Icon, near Kadugodi, Upkar Layout, Whitefield
description:
Unlock Your Child's Creative Potential: Join Our 5-Day Art Summer Camp!

Day 1: Let their imagination soar with pottery hand building, where they'll mold and shape clay into beautiful creations.
Day 2: Watch their green thumbs at work as they create their very own mini garden in a jar, learning about plant care and design along the way.
Day 3: Canvas painting extravaganza! Your child will explore colors, textures, and techniques to create their masterpiece.
Day 4: Get ready for a unique twist with Deco podge art on a clock, where they'll personalize timepieces with their designs and flair.
Day 5: Ignite their senses with candle making, where they'll craft fragrant candles to illuminate any space.

Don't miss out on this enriching and fun-filled summer camp experience for your kid! Sign up now to secure your child's spot in a week of creativity and exploration.

title: Mere Khayal Se By Amandeep Singh
location: Deena Complex, Opp MC Donald, Brigade Rd, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description: After giving multiple sold out shows in 30+ cities Amandeep is coming to Bangalore with his special ‘Mere Khayal Se.’ An hour long show with a mix bag of poetries, shayaris and personal life stories by Amandeep Singh with a twist. We all have our own perspective of viewing things but what if all the things that we see have something hidden behind them. Amandeep is here not just to entertain you but also let you see things beyond the words. So come and spend an amazing evening full of stories, poems and love.

title: The human being and the cosmos
location: Ground Floor, #264, 7th Cross Rd, 6th Block, 1st Block, Jayanagar 1st Block, Jayanagar
description: Here's a glimpse into Living Philosophy! How can we engage more fully with life? Is reality more than it seems to be? We are all the time living 3 levels of life: the personal, the social and the global / cosmic. The voice of the personal level often tends to drown out the other two, and we especially forget that we are linked to life itself! In this talk, we explore the connection between the laws of individual life and the universe – through ideas of the 3 levels of reality according to Greek philosophy, Dharma and Karma, destiny and free will. It invites you to develop an approach to engage fully with life, through meaningful steps in the world.

title: Gautham Govindan LIVE
location: 18th Main Road, 138/B, 5th Cross Rd, behind Cafe Coffee Day, KHB Colony, 5th Block, Koramangala
description: With over 20+million views on Instagram and Youtube, Gautham Govindan brings to you his first solo show. Gautham Govindan also brings to you this description which he’s having a tough time writing. All he can guarantee is an hour of laughs with material honed over the last 2 years. I’ll see you - I mean - He’ll see you there.

title: MAGIQUE presents HIDDEN EMPIRE
subtitle: Impulsive, deeply moving soundscape
location: Plot No, 36, 100 Feet Rd, opp. to Shilton Royale Hotel, Srinivagilu, Chandra Reddy Layout, S T Bed Layout, Koramangala
description:
Magique presents Hidden Empire Hailing from Germany, the duo consists of Branko and Niklas, who have been pushing the boundaries of electronic music since their debut in 2015. They have released numerous tracks on some of the world's top techno labels and have gained a loyal following of fans from around the globe.By sharing a musical vision of creating an impulsive, deeply moving soundscape, using the very essential and deepest elements of House and Techno.

The corresponding result is a floating, emotional journey through a distinctive mixture of genres. The euphoric and uplifting combination of straight drums and hypnotic melodies is made for enormous sound systems and long club nights.

title: nu:beat Nights At WL Club
subtitle: From IBIZA To INDIA
location: 26, Haralur Main Rd, near HP Petrol Station, Amblipura, PWD Quarters, Ambalipura, HSR Layout
description:
Get ready for an electrifying night of beats, performances, and the ultimate kicks!

Headlining the event is the sensational DJ duo ANSWER. Also hitting the stage are DJ ASHTRIX, DJ AUDIOPHILE, rapper AUTHEN, Indo-Western fusion trio FLUTE FANTASY, genre-liberated band TABLE FOR 4, and beatboxer RON.

But this event isn't just about the music – it's the perfect mix of rhythm and style. Join us as we launch the hottest new brand to hit Indian shores!

title: Pet Fiesta
subtitle: Namma Bengaluru Pet Show
location: 1, Jayamahal Main Rd, near Cantonment Railway Station Road, Nandi Durga Road Extension, Jayamahal
description:
Welcome to the Pet Fiesta, a lively and vibrant event celebrating our beloved furry friends! From playful pups to majestic felines, this festival is a paradise for all animal lovers. Enjoy a day filled with exciting activities such as pet parades, talent shows, and even a petting zoo for the little ones. 

Don't forget to browse through the numerous stalls offering treats, toys, and accessories for your cherished companions. Whether you have a four-legged friend of your own or simply appreciate the joy animals bring, the Pet Fiesta promises a day of fun and laughter for everyone. Join us in this enchanting celebration of the special bond between humans and their pets!

title: Soul Jams
subtitle: by Soul Ventures
location: 57, 3rd Floor, 1st Main Rd, Sarakki Industrial Layout, Dollar Layout, 3rd Phase, J. P. Nagar
description:
Soul Jams is the ultimate destination for music lovers! Join us for an evening of relaxation, unwinding, and rejuvenation. Our welcoming space allows you to be yourself and feel at home. 
Bring your guitars, cajones, and voices to sing your heart out alongside our vibrant community in a beautiful jamming session. 

The event comprises three soul-enriching parts: 

1. Soul Open Mic: Perform for a warm and appreciative audience, regardless of where you are on your musical journey. Reach out to @souljams_live on Instagram to book your slot.
2. Social Mixers: Connect with like-minded individuals and find your tribe, fostering meaningful connections. 
3. Soul Jamming: Sing, play instruments, and join the community in a spontaneous, free-flowing musical experience. We create music together, fostering an atmosphere of refreshment and excitement.
